thread.title: RadioShack Creditors Sue Hedge Fund Standard General
thread.title_full: RadioShack Creditors Sue Hedge Fund Standard General - WSJ

author: Matt Wirz
title: RadioShack Creditors Sue Hedge Fund Standard General
text:
RadioShack’s junior creditors are suing hedge fund Standard General LP, the company’s largest prebankruptcy shareholder and current owner, in a last-ditch effort to get repaid.
The lawsuit, filed Monday in U.S. District Court in Fort Worth, Texas, by the committee representing RadioShack’s unsecured creditors, also names Wells Fargo & Co. and former Chief Executive Officer Joseph Magnacca, alleging they helped Standard General...
